effects.effect: Choose one of the following abilities.

features.name: Blur
features.flavor: You release stored time, allowing you to act twice.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect:
You can use a signature or heroic ability. You gain an edge on that ability's power rolls.
###### Force Redirected (5 Discipline)
*The force of your strike moves your target in a surprising direction.*
